t: What are display ads?

t: Amazon Official Site: Echo Show 10 | HD smart display with motion and Alexa

t: Amazon in White House crosshairs over report of displaying tariff costs | Reuters
s: 4 weeks ago - Amazon said on Tuesday its low-cost Haul unit had considered listing import charges for goods in light of new U.S. tariffs but denied looking at such a plan for its main website, after the White House accused it of a hostile political act.

t: Amazon says displaying tariff cost 'not going to happen' after White House blowback
s: 4 weeks ago - Amazon said Tuesday it considered displaying import charges on items sold via its site for ultradiscount items, but that the plan "was never approved and not going to happen."
